title: HTML - CSS
text: Integration of responsive and accessible interfaces, utilization of Figma mockups, CSS animation development. Minimization of loading time, reduction of file size, and enhancement of script and style performance.

title: JavaScript
text: DOM manipulation, creation of dynamic elements, form data management. Working with asynchronous Fetch API requests to interact with the server without page reload.

title: React
text: Building React applications, creating components and managing their state. Developing Single Page Applications (SPA) using React Router for page navigation. Integration of third-party libraries and components into a React project.

title: Project Management
text: Analysis of client requirements, definition of a technical solution that meets functional requirements, project planning. Developing a test strategy and plan in accordance with project requirements. Collaboration with developers to define test integration points and resolve identified issues.

title: Optimization and Debugging
text: Identifying anomalies and correcting existing site issues, SEO and performance optimization, and online site publishing. Checking site compatibility with different browsers and devices to ensure consistent user experience.

title: Test
text: Exploratory, unit, and integration testing, defining a test strategy and writing a test specification, automation of E2E and API tests with Cypress.
